alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 03 at 7:20AM EST until March 03 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR EAST CENTRAL FLORIDA... The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 7 PM EST this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * TIMING...Noon Friday through 7 PM * WINDS...South to Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 35 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the upper 80s to lower 90s. * IMPACTS...Any new or existing fires will be capable of rapid spread.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur with dry vegetation, gusty winds and low humidity. Stay aware of later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
